mapper.select: SELECT RDATE, RTIME, RCODE, RNO FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} UNION SELECT MPDATE, MPMEANS, MYN, MPNO FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} UNION SELECT MTIME, MEMBERID, MTITLE, MINNO FROM MINSERT JOIN MEETING USING (MEMBERID) WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId}

select rtime, rcode from reserve where memberid=#{memberId} and rdate=#{today} union select MTIME, mtitle from minsert join meeting using (memberid) where memberid=#{memberId} and MTIME=#{today} order by rtime
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND RNO=#{rNo} AND RCHECKYN='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MONTHPAY SET MPDATE=#{mpDate}, MPPRICE=#{mpPrice}, MPMEANS=#{mpMeans}, MPTYN=#{mpTyn}, MEMBERID=#{memberId}, MYN='Y' WHERE MPNO=#{mpNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MPTYN='Y' ORDER BY MPDATE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE MONTHPAY SET MPDATE=#{mpDate}, MPPRICE=#{mpPrice}, MPMEANS=#{mpMeans}, MPTYN=#{mpTyn}, MEMBERID=#{memberId}, MYN=#{mYn} WHERE MPNO=(SELECT * FROM (SELECT MPNO FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MPTYN='N' ORDER BY MPDATE) WHERE ROWNUM=1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MONTHPAY VALUES (MONTHPAY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{today}), 6), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NULL, NULL, DEFAULT, #{memberId}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND MPDATE=#{today}
